page.title: 07Housing./S.Leicester.
page.content: In this area, owner occupied semi-detached houses predominate but there is a good deal of old terraced housing in S.Wigston and large estates of (rented) council housing in the Eyres Monsell locality.The most expensive detached houses are along the Lutterworth Rd.in Glen Parva. {Average Prices :}(Based on survey of local Estate Agents, April,1985). Semi-detached : Â£25 490. Detached : Â£47 750.{ {Price Range:}Older semi-detached from Â£21 000, more modern up to Â£29 000.Detached houses range between Â£34 000 and Â£60 000 approximately. Resold council houses tend to be relatively cheap but none were seen for sale at time of survey. Cheapest accomodation in Blaby currently for sale,a flat at Â£17 250.In S.Wigston terraced houses- Â£10 000 to Â£15 000.
